body.name: Projector, Outdoor Movie Projector with 60,000hrs Lamp Life, Full HD 1080P Supported, 7500Lux Portable Video Projector Compatible with TV Stick, HDMI, USB, VGA, AV, Smartphone
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 20 mins
features: 【HD 1080P Supported Resolution】The movie projector is an excellent device for enjoying high-definition movies with its native 720p resolution, ensuring clear and bright image quality. Furthermore, its compact size allows for easy portability in a backpack, making this mini projector convenient for on-the-go entertainment!

【HiFi Stereo Speaker】Immerse yourself in unparalleled audio excellence with our smart projector's state-of-the-art HiFi stereo speaker. The built-in HiFi stereo speakers in this mini projector deliver exceptional audio quality, providing rich and high-fidelity sound effects to enhance your viewing experience.

【Zoom & 240 '' Large Screen】This portable projector offers a delightful and immersive viewing experience for you and your family. Our outdoor projector can project up to 240 inches with a flexible distance range of 4.9 to 20 feet. With our phone projector, you also get to customize your movie-watching experience with the zoom functionality.

【Effortless Setup & Versatile Compatibility】This video projector is user-friendly and can be easily set up in under a minute, allowing you to skip the tedious steps and enjoy audio and video with ease. Whether you're connecting a cell phone, laptop, TV stick, DVD, or PS5 game console, you'll have a quick and compatible connection with the home projector.

【Quality Assurance & After-Sales Service】 If you have any inquiries about our portable projector, please don't hesitate to reach out, and we will give a quick response within 12 hours. Additionally, we also offer a 2-year replacement warranty for your peace of mind. Our dedication to superior quality and customer satisfaction ensures a top-notch cinematic experience with our mini projector.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 121 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to set up with decent picture quality
reviews.reviewText: One of the simpler HDMI projectors I have had the pleasure of using. The image quality is solid, and the device itself is very simple to use. It has a tripod screw mount on the bottom, so you have the option of either setting it up there or on a table. If setting up on a table is your preference, remember to use the angle screw as you need that to tilt the projector upwards. The device supports multiple refresh rates, from 60Hz all the way down to 24Hz, so you can really dial it in to whatever rate you need depending on the type of movie that is being played. The rear of the device had two HDMI ports, 2 USB, a RCA adapter port, and a 3.5mm audio out. The HDMI can be used for bypassing the onboard software to use the device just as you would an external display. The USBs are for playing local media files off of a flash drive. This can be done with the projectors built in video player. I found it easier to connect a laptop and play stuff off of it, but it is nice that the device doesn't require a computer to do so. I also appreciate the AV connector, this made it easy for me to connect some of my older consoles, such as my Wii without having to use a HDMI to RCA adapter.The picture quality is about as you would expect for a compact portable device. It gets bright enough to use in a dim room, but loses some vibrancy if used in the daytime. For its size, it gets plenty bright and looks good at a variety of focal lengths. The focusing is done with a ring at the top. It is very simple to dial in and can be done fairly quickly. The power supply is built in, which helps keep the size of the device down, you only need to connect a standard AC cable on the outside. The included remote works as you would expect, there are IR receivers on both sides so it can pick up input from anywhere in a room. Using the remote isn’t necessary as there are controls on the top of the device as well that can be used to access the device settings. Also there is a built in speaker that can be used to output the audio from the source, but it can’t do stereo separation that well as it is only a single unit. It works well enough if you are playing an older game or just using it as a display. But if you want to watch a movie I would suggest connecting a different audio output.Overall it is a well rounded projector that has the modern input of 1080p HDMI, as well as being compact enough to easily pack in a bag. I would have liked to see a lens cover, but the packaging does include a bubble wrap cover to help transport it, so it’s not too much of a problem. It feels like a pretty decent value as the device has a good feature set and includes a good set of accessories. I can't really find any faults with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a pretty good projector for $30. Compared to others in the price range, it supports 1080p and not just 720p resolution AND you can use wifi with this. I use this while teaching and I can’t get the classroom to be super dark - the blinds are not all able to close fully on the windows - BUT we get a decent picture and the students were able to watch videos fine.The unit itself is small. I can stand it on my tripod without if falling down - even though it’s much bigger than the base that I sit it on. You can also use it with Chromecast or roku etc.The cons are that the sound is low and the speakers are at the bottom of the projector. If you sit it on top of a table or something, the sound will be muffled. The picture when casting via wifi from your phone or tablet is smaller and is by default 720p as the native resolution - this is normal and happens on more expensive projectors from what I’ve seen. Also - as stated in the listing - when using direct wifi, you cannot cast from prime video, Netflix etc. because it doesn’t have adequate technology to protect what you’re steaming. (Well you can, you’ll only hear sound and no video). These things are to be expected for the cheaper price. Just use it with your roku stick or Chrome cast and it’ll fix this issue. Use your own speakers - even from your laptop - and it’ll fix the sound issue. For this cheap price, I don’t mind the issues above - as I said they are easily fixable. All the instructions for setting up wifi are on the projector.All in all I like this projector. I wasn’t sure how it would fair while teaching but I had no problems. The picture is pretty clear/adjustable and the color can be adjusted to one of the presets or you can set it yourself. I have not used the remote yet but there is an easy navigation on the top of the unit to navigate the different setting options.I highly recommend especially if this little one is on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works good in a dark room. Came on time, came with a projector screen sheet. The remote takes 2 AAA batteries. Its a little finicky to angle and focus it but if you have a table or projector stand it should be easier to do. There's no sound but there's a headphone port and a Bluetooth connection option so that should be good and you can hook a speaker to the device your using to make the sound louder. (I blacked out my x-box acount so yall wouldn't know my gamer tag)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my father and kept it to give him as a gift. He loves it. The clarity is great and he's happy watching his movies on "a big screen". Even during the day, he's able to watch anything though it gets a little washed out. I bought a screen for him so now it's extra clear. Before, he projected on an off-white wall. He doesn't use the speakers on the projector but the sound was clear when tested.I recommend this 👌🏾

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a good projector you just have to make sure you have enough room for it to make the 100-in screen I am very impressed for the price of this unit the sound is a little distorted but if you connect it to a Bluetooth speaker it works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Refund not received
reviews.reviewText: I have returned this item on December 30 and is almost January 26 and I have not received the refund yet…and the seller received the item on January 5…that’s not fear. I demand an answer and I recommend to everyone that if you are going to buy this product it is not very good and much less if you are going to return it, they do not return the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good buy for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great buy. With 1080p 4k and Bluetooth, you can't go wrong unless you want to spend more and get all the bells and istles. The built-in speaker is, as expected, quiet and low-quality. Still, truthfully, you don't buy a projector for the speakers you buy to see a clear picture and easy to connect to your systems or whatever presentation you are doing. This is that component. Great and easy to connect.
